Fortune.title: 2019 OVERVIEW
Fortune.content: This year, if you surround yourself with the right people, anything is possible! Those who have your best interest at heart, friends and colleagues who support and love you, can help you rise to the top of your field.

Fortune.title: LOVE
Fortune.content: Intense eclipse energy jump starts your love life. If you want a deep connection with someone, not a frivolous encounter, then romance, passion and friendship are all equally important.

Fortune.title: CAREER
Fortune.content: Your career can rocket all the way to the stars this year. Follow your heart, stay single-minded on your highest priority, and you can make huge headway in any area you put your focus on.

Fortune.title: MONEY
Fortune.content: When you do what you love, and center your attention on what you do best, the money will follow and flow.

Fortune.title: SPIRIT
Fortune.content: People, situations and co-incidences will suddenly appear to provide you with incredible insights that can literally change your life â€“ pay attention!
